meanings.definition: Convert (an image or font) into pixels for display on a computer screen.
meanings.sent1: She was rasterizing the logo to make it suitable for the website.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer spent hours rasterizing the artwork for the digital display.
meanings.sent3: When the computer started rasterizing the picture, it looked like a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent4: The artist's mind was like a machine, rasterizing every detail of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: As she focused on rasterizing, the screen slowly filled with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The process of converting vector graphics into raster images.
meanings.sent1: The rasterizing of the logo resulted in a high-quality image for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: During the rasterizing stage, the software transformed the scalable design into pixels.
meanings.sent3: The sudden sound of rasterizing echoed through the office, signaling the start of a new project.
meanings.sent4: The concept of rasterizing was like turning a detailed blueprint into a colorful painting.
meanings.sent5: In the world of design, rasterizing is the bridge between precision and visual impact.
